website_summaries.verdict: This Taser doubles as a stun gun if you prefer to have both options.
pros: Ergonomically designed for easy carry and easy deployment
Can be used as a close-up stun gun if required
cons: Batteries may be dead on arrival, no power indicator
Instruction manual difficult to access online

customer_reviews.title: Batter dead. No way to know if batter is charged!
customer_reviews.text: Risk your life with this product!!!Dangerous to carry when the battery is dead. You think you have a deterrent in your pocket?. Only to find out it’s not functioning when you desperately need it!!! Battery dead after one month in the box. Purchased, never used. Took it out of box to look at it and start carrying it. No way of knowing if battery is charged. This can mean life or death!! No refund apparently since I bought it 45 days ago and they only allow returns before 30 days. Don’t risk your life by depending on this. It’s NOT reliable!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael shew

customer_reviews.title: Great size and feel
customer_reviews.text: Great size and feel. The holster is a must! Make sure to ‘test’ the trigger before you put in a cartridge, because it is a hair trigger for sure. All and all, would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: William Allen

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you look at what your buying
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet but seems legit. I ordered the wrong one this kit only comes with taser and two cartridges that's it and a practice thingy. I thought I got the rechargeable one oh well I'll just have to get it later
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: bottom  battery cover of taser falls off
customer_reviews.text: The bottom piece that hold the battery fall off so then you would have to use duct tape to keep the battery and or replace it by ordering a new bottle cap to keep the battery secured!
customer_reviews.author: Ricco kimbrough

customer_reviews.title: Shocking alternative to carrying a handgun...
customer_reviews.text: If you aren't ready to carry a gun yet...this is a great alternative...or carry both.
customer_reviews.author: ErnieW

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Nice a bit pricey I think and not very well documented so you May have to go look at the videos on line not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Arturo Bustamante

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!!!
customer_reviews.text: The item was packaged very well and was delivered very quickly all the functions are a check! The item is ready for use after unpackaging! I recommend everybody who buys this item to also purchase a holster! Everyone be safe
customer_reviews.author: Prince

customer_reviews.title: Does what its supposed to, hope I never have to use it
customer_reviews.text: Taser plus arrived quickly and works as it should. Mine didn't come with a sleeve like the description says but I can live without it. Its a solid product and the seller was fast.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Self Defense Item
customer_reviews.text: I love it....the feel and look of it....the only thing I could say is a draw on it is what everyone else has said and that's the battery in it is kinda loose...but other than that it is perfect
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Works great had it for several months no problems or issues as of yet
customer_reviews.author: buddy brown

customer_reviews.title: and my wife and I cannot believe how compact it is (in a good way). This little gem is going into our ...
customer_reviews.text: It just arrived today. The battery is strong, and my wife and I cannot believe how compact it is (in a good way). This little gem is going into our commuter car, and I just ordered another one for our truck. Finally, a taser that looks and feels like a real gun!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome non-lethal weapon, great value and use of force. The battery life could be better, but still a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: When you need it . Its there
customer_reviews.text: A must have for anyone . Reliable and great knockout power
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sabatino

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Padded the battery compartment
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Padded the battery compartment, put Hogue hand-All Grip Sleeve, am making a kydex holster. If you cannot carry a gun in your state, this is better nothing, but I would only attempt to us it if a life is threatened - it is better nothing but not against a firearm!
customer_reviews.author: Brent Lyle Bolin

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money and time
customer_reviews.text: The battery came dead on arrival attempt to get a replacement and seller said to contact Manufacturer to get one. What a wait of my time and money, now need approval from seller to receive a refund.
customer_reviews.author: MiGUEL

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: This is a sound investment. Personal safety is something not to be taken lightly. This is a great tool for the box. Good quality with a reasonable price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Darby

customer_reviews.title: Its legal in Newyork  why not ship
customer_reviews.text: New York: Stun Guns and Tasers are Legal The sale, possession and use of stun guns and Tasers for self defense are legal without major restrictions. ... The only exceptions were for law enforcement, authorized military servicemembers, and certain defense contractors. (N.Y. Penal Law §§ 265.01,265.20 (2019).)
customer_reviews.author: cliffie

customer_reviews.title: Get a c2 or x26 falls apart and battery trash
customer_reviews.text: Not Happy with it at all , my x26 is better , 1st the battery died very quickly, 2nd the piece securing the battery pops off 3rd only a couple of holsters aviliable for the pulse. , waste of money .
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: it's easy to grab and use
customer_reviews.text: I work security, I carry 2 tazers get the pulse molded holster , I've had to unfortunately had to use my pulse in self defense, and the threat was over saved my butt , it's easy to grab and use , takers work
customer_reviews.author: Go ge$$er

customer_reviews.title: Great taser
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this to everyone great way to stay safe
customer_reviews.author: Harris Chambers

customer_reviews.title: i dont know why the negative reviews.
customer_reviews.text: perfect came in charged up . Discreet , fast shipping & saved my life from some dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel bevok

customer_reviews.title: Great product and very easy to work with
customer_reviews.text: Great product and very easy to work with. Had a question and answered quickly. Great products and customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Haws

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this....
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this thing. It is a piece of junk. Way over priced by about $375.00
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Brown

product_meta.title: Taser 39061 Pulse Self-Defense Tool with 2 Live Cartridges and Target, Medium, Black
product_meta.description: TASER pulse is an advanced, effective, less-lethal defense tool that immobilizes attackers for 30 seconds. Packing the same knock-down punch trusted by law enforcement, it was built with Civilian self-protection in mind. Weighing in at just 8 ounces, this high-tech, intuitively-designed device is revolutionizing the self-defense market.
feature_bullets: Optimized self-defense range: 15-foot Shooting distance, ideal for most defensive situations
Powerful protection ensures a safe escape: 30-second muscular override gives you time to get away, and we'll replace your TASER device free of charge
Effective up close: contact stun capabilities help at close range or in the event of a missed shot
Legal to own, legal to carry: no License needed in most States
Comfortable to carry and Use: shaved safeties and angled sights make the Pulse ergonomic to carry and draw
